Hi {!Application__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for taking the interest to submit a full application for the life chances fund.
You have been successful at this stage. Soon, you will receive an email detailing what your next steps are.
In the meantime, if you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@cabinetoffice.gov.uk with the application ID - {!Application__c.Name}.
Kind Regards, Centre for Social Impact Bonds
